text: Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumaziba Ahasian otarim Joas mɨsoghezɨ an aremezir puvatɨ. Me kamaghɨn fozir puvatɨ, Atrivim Jehoramɨn guivim Jehoseba, an Atrivim Ahasian buaramizim, an ofa gamir gumazim Jehoiadan amuim, amizir kamra, a moga atrivimɨn otarir aremeghamibar tongɨn Joas inigha, amizir an ganamim ko, aning isa danganir me daguivsiaba arɨzimɨn aven aning modo. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Atalia Joas mɨsoghezɨ an aremezir puvatɨ.
